item.title: Charlie Shrem Released From Prison, Enjoying the 'Small Things'
item.description:
Charlie Shrem Released From Prison, Enjoying the 'Small Things'

Charlie Shrem, former CEO of early bitcoin exchange BitInstant, has been released from prison after serving a sentence for money laundering and unlicensed money transmission. Also read: Breakout Gaming Launches Competitive eSports Platform Shrem announced his release (which actually happened a few weeks ago) in a blog post on his home page, titled " Onward."

item.title: 70% of nodes accept Bloom filters, despite DoS attack vector?
item.description:
70% of nodes accept Bloom filters, despite DoS attack vector?

Could someone explain why so many Bitcoin nodes allow Bloom filtering given that DoS attacks exist [1], [2] for such nodes? According to bitnodes.21.co, right now 3879 nodes out of the total of 5515

item.title: Will Ether Value Soar After Ethereum Hard Fork and ETH BTF Launch?
item.description:
Will Ether Value Soar After Ethereum Hard Fork and ETH BTF Launch?

Ahead of the Ethereum hard fork (that happens July 20-21 depending on time zone) a new company has filed to launch an Ether ETF.

item.title: Ether Trading Fund Registers with the SEC
item.description:
Ether Trading Fund Registers with the SEC

EtherIndex LLC, a Wilmington, Del.-based corporation, has registered a trust called the EtherIndex Ether Trust with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), marking the first ether-based trading fund. The trust's purpose is to give shareholders exposure to the daily change in the U.S. dollar price of ether, minus expenses and liabilities, according to its prospectus.

item.title: PayMeaBit: a Bitcoin Social Network | HolyTransaction
item.description:
PayMeaBit: a Bitcoin Social Network | HolyTransaction

is a new Bitcoin social network where you can publish your contents (photos, charts, infographics and more) and earn bits, or a small fraction of Bitcoin. As Bitcoin has eight decimals, it allows microtransactions that are very useful when you want to buy somenthing or leave a tip online, and this is the reason why we defined it as the Internet of Money.

item.title: Ethereum Miners Reach Conclusive Decision to Hardfork
item.description:
Ethereum Miners Reach Conclusive Decision to Hardfork

Almost 60% of Ethereum miners have upgraded to support Ethereum's historical hardfork, reaching a conclusive and final decision in alignment with the wishes of Ethereum holders who voted overwhelmingly in favor of the fork, with 87% supporting the restoration of stolen property to their rightful owners.

item.title: [Bit]coin flipping: "Bitcoin is the world's first universal currency" - JAXenter
item.description:
[Bit]coin flipping: "Bitcoin is the world's first universal currency" - JAXenter

Bitcoin has just experienced its second halving and, just like the first time, it did not have a substantial effect on the cryptocurrency's price. Still, some movement is bound to happen -some people directly involved in this matter claim.

item.title: First Ether ETF Filed With the SEC is Not Offering Insurance
item.description:
First Ether ETF Filed With the SEC is Not Offering Insurance

As competition heats up amongst Bitcoin ETF providers SolidX and the Winklevoss Twins, another contender emerged to establish an exchange-traded fund based on a digital currency. Recently found company called EtherIndex LLC officially filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on July 15 to offer the public and conventional investors opportunities to invest in Ether, the underlying currency of smart contract-based decentralized platform known as Ethereum.

item.title: Support Digital Currencies, Blockchain & Fintech, US Congress Tells Govt
item.description:
Support Digital Currencies, Blockchain & Fintech, US Congress Tells Govt

With a new bipartisan bill by the House of Representatives, a call has been issued to the US Government to adopt a national policy to promote citizens' access to new financial innovation including blockchain and digital currencies.

item.title: Bitcoin Scam Site Alert - HashBX
item.description:
Bitcoin Scam Site Alert - HashBX

For those bitcoin users who have ever wanted to purchase "the powers" of cloud mining, HashBX might be the company for you. That is, assuming you don't mind taking a significant risk with the potential for losing all of your money shortly. This is yet another cloud mining company with zero evidence of them owning any hashpower whatsoever.
